Pre-Game Insights: Records suggest that hosts India are down for an upset against Bangladesh.
Bangladesh have won three out of the four matches played between the two nations in the past year.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The last time India beat Bangladesh in ODIs was in December 2022.
India won by 227 runs in the Chattogram match.
Bangladesh won by 1 wicket, 5 runs, and 6 runs in the previous matches in 2022 and 2023 respectively.
